name: Nikwax Tent & Gear Solarwash Spray 500ml
description: This water-based cleaning spray effectively cleans tents, packs, panniers and other water-resistant and waterproof fabrics, and also protects against UV deterioration. Unlike household cleaning products, Tent & Gear Solarwash won't leave behind residue that can affect water repellency.Cleans, conditions and protects weatherproof textiles.Water-based formula won't harm water-repellent treatments.500ml.
